tweet: Remember our plan to connect the @Feintool #fineblanking press to a @3DS_SIMULIA #FEM server via #IOTA? Well, the handshake worked. Soon it will be possible to get a #DigitalTwin autonomously for each real part. #M2M #MachineEconomy.  https://t.co/RDmXd4aHZF @rwth_wzl @xCluster

Platooning is a technology for trucks to drive semiautonomously in a so called platoon. They reduce the distance to one another which leads to improved fuel efficiency & safety. With #IOTA, trucks will be able to compensate each other for the differences in fuel savings. #Tangle  https://t.co/VysNdRKND8
